pkgmetadata.longdescription: # `vessl-python-sdk`## Basic usage```pythonimport vesslvessl.init(organization_name="my-organization")vessl.create_experiment(...)```## Keras- Use ExperimentCallback```pythonimport vesslfrom vessl.integration.keras import ExperimentCallbackvessl.init()# Keras training codemodel = Model()model.compile(...)# Add integrationmodel.fit(x, y, epochs=5, callbacks=[ExperimentCallback()])```- Run experiment on Vessl using Web UI or SDK## For M1```bashdocker context create remote --docker "host=ssh://ec2-user@10.110.3.24"docker context use remotedocker build . -t vessl-python-sdkdocker run vessl-python-sdk```
